bugs: - Custom Filters not functional
Snapchat now blocks adding / removing / renaming friends for suspicious users that apparently use Mods / Plugins etc
The Master Switch in SnapTools Settings can work on Pie or on Oreo. It temporarily disables SnapTools completely, no reboot required.
If this does not solve your problem, you need to uninstall SnapTools and maybe even Xposed.
If you experience any issues, never hesitate to tell me about it. Discord is your friend
